lead_paragraph: John Cramsey, who said he was on an antidrug mission when he was pulled over by the police in June, is facing felony weapons charges.

headline.print_headline: Man Arrested  at Tunnel in Guns Case  Is Out on Bail
headline.main: Man Arrested in Holland Tunnel Guns Case Is Freed on Bail

snippet: John Cramsey, who said he was on an antidrug mission when he was pulled over by the police in June, is facing felony weapons charges....
abstract: Lawyer for John Cramsey, Pennsylvania man who was arrested in June at Holland Tunnel after police found cache of weapons in his truck, says his client is out on bail after supporters put up cash for his release.
